name: Order Empire
startIntroPart1: You are surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual technology and struggle for dominance.
startIntroPart2: You are the leader of the nation called 'Order', and your way is of peace and knowledge. your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology from each nation along the way.
attacked: You're trying to invade me? hahaha
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
tradeRequest: Trade offer. You recieve: nothing. I recieve: your territory.
